title: iKern
content:
I made a search in the forum for something more about iKern before I wrote this post but nothing of assistance came up. So I am asking once more ...

Does anyone know if and where I can obtain a copy of the iKern application? I saw on [http://www.iginomarini.com/ikern.html](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203213835/http:/www.iginomarini.com/ikern.html) that the application is available for purchase but, as someone else noted in another post, Mr. Marini’s contact information don’t seem to work.

In addition, I downloaded the DTL Font Master Light Suite but I saw that the autospacing feature in the KernMaster application doesn’t work on this version of the software (as it says). Is this actually the case or did I do something wrong?

 [‹ Optical Weights MM](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203213835/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41097 "Go to previous forum topic") [unicode for alternates ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203213835/http:/www.typophile.com/node/41070 "Go to next forum topic")
author: gtrianta

comments.content:
iKern has been discussed [here](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203213835/http:/www.typophile.com/node/10317) — with contributions by Mr Marini himself.  ;-)

<cite>... Is this actually the case or did I do something wrong?</cite>

It is the case. (If you plan to use KM in combination with FLS, you may also have a look at [this](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203213835/http:/www.kltf.de/kltf_kerning1.htm) and [this](http://web.archive.org/web/20081203213835/http:/www.kltf.de/kltf_notes_borders.htm).)
